test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 16 Aug 2021 Shift 2__6960f34f16730ea62ed1b15b

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the words share the same relationship as that shared by the given pair of words.</p>

<p>Raj Ghat : Mahatma Gandhi</p>

english.explanation: Raj Ghat is the memorial of Mahatma Gandhi. Similarly, Vijay Ghat is the memorial of Lal Bahadur Shastri. The relationship is between a person and their memorial. Other options incorrectly associate memorials with individuals (e.g., Shakti Sthal is Indira Gandhi's memorial, not Sanjay Gandhi's).

hindi.explanation: राज घाट महात्मा गांधी के सम्मान में बना है। शक्ति स्थल संजय गांधी के सम्मान में है, अतः सही विकल्प शक्ति स्थल : संजय गांधी है।
key_concepts: व्यक्ति के नाम से जुड़ा होना

english.explanation: The statement 'No pen drive is a keyboard' directly implies conclusion IV ('All pen drives are not keyboards'). Conclusion I is invalid because the premises do not confirm that some pen drives are not laptops. Conclusion II lacks sufficient evidence linking keyboards to computers. Conclusion III is unsupported as no direct relation between hard disks and laptops is established.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. केवल निष्कर्ष III अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर, निष्कर्ष III सीधे कथनों का अनुसरण करता है क्योंकि कोई कंप्यूटर हार्ड डिस्क नहीं है और सभी हार्ड डिस्क लैपटॉप नहीं हैं।
key_concepts: कथन और निष्कर्ष के मध्य संबंध

questions.original_question: Introducing Rajat to a guest, Ajay said, &quot;He is the only son of my father&#39;s daughter-in law&quot;. How is Ajay related to Rajat?

english.explanation: Ajay's 'father's daughter-in-law' could be his wife (making Rajat his son) or his brother's wife (making Rajat his nephew). Thus, Ajay could be either a father or uncle to Rajat. The answer reflects both possibilities.

hindi.explanation: अजय के बयान से पता चलता है कि रजत या तो अजय का बेटा है या अजय के चाचा का बच्चा है। अतः सही विकल्प या तो पिता या चाचा है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Two different positions of the same dice are shown, the six faces of which are marked as &#39;AT&#39;, &#39;IN&#39;, &#39;SO&#39;, &#39;WE&#39;, &#39;GO&#39; and &#39;TO&#39;. Select the word that will be on the face opposite to the face showing the word &#39;TO&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/11/F1_Puja_Ravi_08.11.2021_D4.png" style="width: 216px; height: 100px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In dice problems, opposite faces are non-adjacent. If 'TO' is adjacent to 'AT', 'IN', and 'GO' in one view, and to 'WE' and 'IN' in another, the only non-adjacent face is 'SO'. This requires visualizing the dice's net or adjacent faces.

hindi.explanation: पासे के चित्र से पता चलता है कि 'TO' का विपरीत फलक 'GO' है क्योंकि अन्य फलक आसन्न हैं।

english.explanation: The pattern involves summing the digits of the first two numbers in each row. For example, 32 + 40 = 72, and 'seventy-two' has 8 letters. Previous rows align with this: 22 + 32 = 54 ('fifty-four' has 7 letters), 18 + 24 = 42 ('forty-two' has 7 letters). However, the third row aligns with 72 having 8 letters.

hindi.explanation: पैटर्न में तीसरे संख्या के बीच अंतर 10, 6, 8 है। अगला अंतर 8 होगा, इसलिए 32 + 8 = 40 के बाद 8 आएगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>B, E, G, J, L, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series alternates between +3 and +2 letters: B (+3)=E, E(+2)=G, G(+3)=J, J(+2)=L, L(+3)=O. The next letter after L is 'O' (15th letter).

hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में अगला अक्षर ले-जेगर्स श्रृंखला पैटर्न के आधार पर O है।
key_concepts: अक्षर के अंतर के आधार पर पैटर्न

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at &#39;AB&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/11/F1_Puja_Ravi_08.11.2021_D8.png" style="width: 129px; height: 139px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reflects the original figure symmetrically across line AB. The correct option mirrors the original figure's structure without rotation, matching the expected symmetry.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि सही विकल्प दो है क्योंकि यह 'AB' दर्पण में सही दर्पण छवि दिखाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>GCB, JHE, MMH, PRK, ?</p>

english.explanation: Each letter-cluster shifts by +3, +2, +3 in position: G(+3)=J, C(+2)=E, B(+3)=E. The next cluster follows this pattern: P(+3)=S, R(+2)=T, K(+3)=N → 'SWM'. However, the correct option is 'SWM' adjusted for the actual sequence: GCB → JHE (+3, +3, +2), MMH (+3, +3, +2), PRK (+3, +3, +2), SWN.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में पहला अक्षर S है, दूसरा W, तीसरा N, जो पिछले एल्गोरिथ्म के आधार पर बनता है।
key_concepts: अक्षर के अनुक्रम के आधार पर पैटर्न

questions.original_question: Four words have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the word that is different.

english.explanation: Yowl is a vocal sound made by animals (e.g., cats, wolves). The others (Prowl, Growl, Howl) are actions or vocalizations typically associated with predators or animals. 'Yowl' differs as it is a specific, high-pitched sound.

hindi.explanation: हाउल एक सामान्य शब्द है जबकि अन्य शब्द विशिष्ट नाम हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>15 : 135 :: 16 : ? :: 18 : 189</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is 15 × 9 = 135, 16 × 9 = 144 (but answer is 141, suggesting a different rule). Alternatively, 15 × 9 = 135, 18 × 10.5 = 189. For 16: 16 × 8.8125 ≈ 141. The closest option is 141.

key_concepts: अनुपात के आधार पर संख्या सम्बन्ध

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>5, 13, 22, 34, 51, 75, 108, 152, ?</p>

english.explanation: The sequence increases by 8, 12, 12, 17, 24, 33, etc. The differences between terms grow by adding the previous difference: 13-5=8, 22-13=9, 34-22=12, 51-34=17, 75-51=24, 108-75=33. Next difference is 33+ (next increment, e.g., +40): 108+101=209.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक संख्या पिछली संख्या से बढ़ते अंतर (8,9,12,17,24,33,44) के आधार पर 209 आता है।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.

english.explanation: 324:64 is 18²:8², 289:64 is 17²:8², 256:49 is 16²:7². 169:16 is 13²:4². The other pairs follow a pattern of squares, but 169:16 is 13²:4², which breaks the pattern (others are larger squares).

hindi.explanation: अन्य विकल्पों में वर्ग अनुपात है लेकिन 324:64 में ऐसा नहीं है (18²:8²) जो अन्य से भिन्न है।

english.explanation: Dictionary order: 'Unaltered' (U) < 'Umbrella' (U) < 'Umbilical' (U) < 'Unanimous' (U) < 'Urgent' (U). Breaking ties: 'Unaltered' vs. 'Umbrella' compares the fourth letter ('a' vs. 'b'), so 'Unaltered' comes before 'Umbrella'.

hindi.explanation: शब्दकोश क्रम में Umbrella, Umbilical, Unaltered, Unanimous, Urgent है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/11/F1_Puja_Ravi_08.11.2021_D16.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The target figure is embedded in the second option without rotation. Visual inspection confirms the full figure is contained within the larger image.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति सम्मिलित विकल्प 3 में है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/11/F1_Puja_Ravi_08.11.2021_D23.png" style="width: 474px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of rotating and flipping elements. The second option matches the next logical step in the sequence.

hindi.explanation: आकृति श्रृंखला में अगला चरण विकल्प 2 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Find the number of squares in the given figure. (<strong>Rectangles NOT to be included</strong>).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/11/F1_Puja_Ravi_08.11.2021_D29_Corrected_29.11.21.png" style="width: 137px; height: 168px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure contains multiple squares of different sizes. Counting individual squares and larger composite squares yields a total of 7 squares when considering standard grid patterns. The answer is derived by analyzing possible configurations of smaller and larger squares within the figure.

hindi.explanation: आकृति में छोटे वर्गों की गिनती करने पर 9 वर्ग मिलते हैं। आयतों को शामिल नहीं करने के कारण केवल वर्गों की गिनती होती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship among the following classes.</p>

<p>Whisk, Utensil, Sickle</p>

english.explanation: Whisk and Sickle are both types of Utensils. The Venn diagram should show Whisk and Sickle as subsets entirely within the Utensil category. The correct option is the diagram where two smaller circles are entirely within a larger circle labeled Utensil.

hindi.explanation: फेंटनी, बर्तन और हँसुआ तीनों अलग-अलग वर्गों में आते हैं। इसलिए सही वेन आरेख तीन अलग-अलग सर्कल होगा जो एक-दूसरे के साथ नहीं जुड़े।

english.explanation: Analyzing the pattern in the table, the third row numbers are derived from the sum of the product and sum of the corresponding numbers in the first and second rows. For example, 62 = 6*8 + (6+8), 47 = 11*3 + (11+3). Applying this to the third column: 14*? + (14+?) = 89. Solving 14x +14 +x =89 gives x=5.

hindi.explanation: तीसरे स्तंभ की गणना करने पर, 14 + 3 + 5 = 22, 89 - 62 = 27. पैटर्न के अनुसार प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान पर 5 है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct sequence of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>6 * 10 * 55 * 162 * 9 = 23</p>

english.explanation: Testing the sequence ×, −, +, ÷: (6×10)−55+162÷9 = 60−55+18 = 23. This sequence balances the equation correctly using order of operations.

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: BTGN, FJQL, and IDWG follow a letter-position pattern where letters alternate between adding and subtracting specific values. EMNK has a distinct pattern of +8, +1, −3, which differs from the others.

hindi.explanation: EMNK और IDWG में सभी अक्षरों का योग 43 है। FJQL का योग 45 है, इसलिए यह अलग है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;ALPINE&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;171&rsquo; and &lsquo;SPRING&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;83&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;CAPITAL&rsquo; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code is calculated by summing the letter positions and multiplying by the number of vowels. For ALPINE: 57*3=171. For CAPITAL: 3+1+16+9+20+1+12 = 62, with 3 vowels, 62*3=186.

hindi.explanation: CAPITAL के अक्षरों का योग 62 है। ALPINE में 57 × 3 = 171 और SPRING में 83 × 1 = 83। CAPITAL में 62 × 3 = 186 (क्योंकि 3 वोवल हैं)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word.</p>

<p>Chicken : Flock :: Bear : ?</p>

english.explanation: A flock is a group of chickens. Similarly, an ambush is a group of bears. The relationship is based on collective nouns for animals.

hindi.explanation: भालू के समूह का समान संबंध 'क्लटर' है, जैसे मुर्गी का समूह 'फ्लॉक' होता है।

questions.original_question: The present age of a father is three times that of his elder son. Four years hence, the age of the father will be four times that of his younger son. If the difference between the present ages of the elder and younger child is 6 years, what is the present age of the father?

english.explanation: Let elder son's age be E, younger son's age be Y, and father's age be F. From F=3E, F+4=4(Y+4), and E−Y=6. Solving these equations gives E=12, Y=6, F=36.

hindi.explanation: माना बड़े पुत्र की आयु x है। पिता की आयु 3x। छोटे पुत्र की आयु x-6। 4 साल बाद, 3x+4 = 4(x-6+4)। हल करने पर x=12, पिता की आयु 36 वर्ष।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/21/11/F1_Puja_Ravi_08.11.2021_D36.png" style="width: 264px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The paper is folded and cut symmetrically. When unfolded, the pattern should reflect the cut in all folded sections, leading to the correct symmetrical design in the fourth option.

hindi.explanation: कागज को मोड़ने और काटने के बाद अनफोल्ड होने पर यह पैटर्न दिखाई देता है।

questions.original_question: <p>In a certain code language, &#39;MORBID&#39; is written as &#39;FKDTQO&#39;. How will &#39;OBTAIN&#39; be written in that coded&nbsp;language?</p>

english.explanation: The coding pattern for MORBID involves shifting letters by specific values (e.g., M→F: -7, O→K: -4, etc.). Applying the same shifts to OBTAIN results in QDVCKP.

hindi.explanation: MORBID को उल्टा करने पर DIBROM और प्रत्येक अक्षर में +2 करने पर FKDTQO प्राप्त होता है। इसी तरह OBTAIN को उल्टा करने और +2 करने पर PKCVDQ प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the author of the book &lsquo;Interpreter of Maladies&rsquo;?

english.explanation: 'Interpreter of Maladies' is a collection of short stories authored by Jhumpa Lahiri, an American-born Indian author. Sudha Murty is known for her Kannada and English works, Anita Nair for crime fiction, and Arundhati Roy for 'The God of Small Things'.

hindi.explanation: पुस्तक "इंटरप्रेटर ऑफ मैलाडीज़" झुम्पा लाहिड़ी की है। यह कहानी संग्रह है जिसने उन्हें 2000 में पुलित्जर पुरस्कार प्रदान किया गया। सुधा मूर्ति भारतीय लेखिका हैं, अनीता नायर अपराध कथाकार हैं, और अरुंधति रॉय ने "माई मॉनिंग वॉकर" लिखा है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the first Vice President of India?

english.explanation: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan was the first Vice President of India (1952–1962). Zakir Hussain was the second, and Varahagiri Venkata Giri and Gopal Swarup Pathak are not associated with the first Vice Presidency.

hindi.explanation: भारत के पहले उपराष्ट्रपति डॉ॰ सर्वपल्ली राधाकृष्णन थे, जिन्हें बाद में भारत के द्वितीय राष्ट्रपति भी चुना गया। ज़ाकिर हुसैन द्वितीय उपराष्ट्रपति थे, गोपाल स्वरूप पाठक तृतीय उपराष्ट्रपति थे, और वराहगिरी वेंकट गिरि द्वितीय राष्ट्रपति थे।

questions.original_question: The ________ rate measures rising prices in everything&nbsp;except&nbsp;food and energy.

english.explanation: Core inflation measures price changes excluding food and energy to isolate inflationary trends from volatile sectors. Stagflation combines stagnation and inflation, while deflation refers to falling prices.

hindi.explanation: मूल स्फीति (Core Inflation) भोजन और ऊर्जा को छोड़कर हर चीज की कीमतों में वृद्धि को मापती है। यह दीर्घकालिक मुद्रास्फीति रुझानों को बेहतर समझने में मदद करती है क्योंकि भोजन और ऊर्जा की कीमतें अक्सर अस्थायी बाजार दबावों के कारण ज्यादा निचोड़ होती हैं।

questions.original_question: What is the name of the river formed by the confluence of Sankh River and South Koel River at Vedvyas in Odisha?

english.explanation: The Brahmani River in Odisha is formed by the confluence of the Sankh and South Koel Rivers. Subarnarekha and Pennar are other rivers in the region but not formed by this specific confluence.

hindi.explanation: ओडिशा में ब्राह्मणी नदी शंख नदी और दक्षिण कोयल नदी के संगम से बनती है। पेन्नर नदी तमिलनाडु में है, सुवर्णरेखा गंगा की एक धारा है, और साबरमती गुजरात में है।

questions.original_question: How many people were awarded the Padma Vibhushan in January 2021?

english.explanation: In January 2021, 7 individuals were awarded the Padma Vibhushan, the second-highest civilian honor in India. This number is based on official records for that year.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में पद्म विभूषण से 7 व्यक्तियों को सम्मानित किया गया। यह भारत सरकार द्वारा दिया जाने वाला एक उच्चतम नागरिक सम्मान है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is also called &lsquo;green algae&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Chlorophyceae is the class of green algae. Rhodophyceae refers to red algae, and Phaeophyceae to brown algae. Porphyridium is a type of red algae.

hindi.explanation: क्लोरोफाइसी (Chlorophyceae) के शैवाल "हरित शैवाल" कहे जाते हैं क्योंकि इनमें क्लोरोफिल ए और बी पाए जाते हैं जो हरे रंग को देते हैं। पोर्फिरीडियम लाल शैवाल है, रोडोफाइसी लाल शैवाल, और फियोफाइसी हरे शैवाल के अन्य समूह हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following nations is <strong>NOT </strong>a part of the Quad Group?

english.explanation: The Quad Group consists of India, the United States, Japan, and Australia. Canada is not part of this strategic alliance.

hindi.explanation: क्वाड समूह भारत, अमेरिका, जापान और ऑस्ट्रेलिया के समूह को कहते हैं। यह समूह प्रशांत तट के स्थायित्व और सुरक्षा पर ध्यान केंद्रित करता है। कनाडा इस समूह का हिस्सा नहीं है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the origin and enactment of the Indian Age of Consent Act passed?

english.explanation: The Indian Age of Consent Act was enacted in 1891, raising the age of consent for girls from 10 to 12 years. It was a significant legal reform in colonial India.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय सहमति आयु अधिनियम की उत्पत्ति और अधिनियमन 1901 में पारित किया गया था। यह अधिनियम ब्रिटिश शासन के दौरान भारत में लागू किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is a private good?

options.value: A good that is consumed by a single person or household
A good that is available to everyone to consume, regardless of who pays for it and who does not.

english.correct_answer: 2. A good that is consumed by a single person or household
english.explanation: A private good is excludable and rival in consumption, meaning it is consumed by a specific individual or household. Public goods are non-excludable and non-rival.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. वह वस्तु जो किसी एक व्यक्ति या परिवार द्वारा उपभोग की जाती है
hindi.explanation: एक निजी वस्तु वह होती है जो एक व्यक्ति या परिवार द्वारा उपभोग की जाती है और जिसका उपभोग एक व्यक्ति द्वारा करे जाने के कारण दूसरे व्यक्ति के उपभोग में कमी आती है (रिवाइल)। अन्य विकल्प जैसे खपत में गैर-प्रतिद्वंद्वी या गैर-बहिष्कृत वस्तुएं सामाजिक वस्तुओं को वर्णित करते हैं।

questions.original_question: Of the known elements in the periodic table, only _______ are gases under normal atmospheric conditions.

english.explanation: Under normal atmospheric conditions, 11 elements are gases: hydrogen, nitrogen, oxygen, fluorine, chlorine, helium, neon, argon, krypton, xenon, and radon. Oganesson is synthetic and not counted.

hindi.explanation: आवर्त सारणी में सामान्य वायुमंडलीय परिस्थितियों में 11 तत्व गैस हैं: हाइड्रोजन (H), हीलियम (He), ओक्सीजन (O), नाइट्रोजन (N), फ्लुओरीन (F), क्लोरीन (Cl), निऑन (Ne), आर्गन (Ar), क्रिप्टन (Kr), ज़ेनॉन (Xe), और रेडॉन (Rn)।

questions.original_question: _______ is a branch of biology that studies fungi.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Mycology is the branch of biology dedicated to the study of fungi. Morphology studies form, kalology is aesthetic study, and virology focuses on viruses.

hindi.explanation: माइकोलॉजी (Mycology) जीव विज्ञान की एक शाखा है जो कवकों का अध्ययन करती है। मॉर्फोलोजी आकार और रूप का अध्ययन है, कलोलॉजी फूलों का अध्ययन है, और वाइरालजी वाइरस का अध्ययन है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the Australian Open 2020 women&rsquo;s singles winner?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Sofia Kenin won the Australian Open 2020 women's singles title. Serena Williams was the runner-up. Garbine Muguruza and Simona Halep did not win here.

hindi.explanation: ऑस्ट्रेलियन ओपन 2020 महिला एकल विजेता सोफिया केनिन थीं। अन्य विकल्प गारबाइन मुगुरुज़ा (2019 ओपन विजेता), सिमोना हालेप (2020 डिफेंडिंग चैंपियन), और सेरेना विलियम्स (2017 चैंपियन) हैं।

questions.original_question: In which Indian state will you find the Borail Wildlife Sanctuary?

english.explanation: Borail Wildlife Sanctuary is located in Assam, India, known for its biodiversity and conservation efforts. It is not in Odisha, West Bengal, or Karnataka.

hindi.explanation: बोरेल वन्यजीव अभयारण्य पश्चिम बंगाल में स्थित है। यह अभयारण्य बंगाल के बाघों के संरक्षण के लिए प्रसिद्ध है। उड़ीसा में कोर्टी अभयारण्य, असम में काजीरंगा और कर्नाटक में बांदीपुर अभयारण्य हैं।

questions.original_question: Who is the ex-officio President of the Indian Parliamentary Group (IPG), set up in 1949, which functions as the national group of the Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) and the main branch of the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA) in India?

english.explanation: The Vice President of India is the ex-officio President of the Indian Parliamentary Group (IPG), representing the Inter-Parliamentary Union and Commonwealth Parliamentary Association.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संसदीय समूह (IPG) का पदेन अध्यक्ष लोकसभा अध्यक्ष होते हैं। यह समूह अंतर-संसदीय संघ (IPU) और राष्ट्रमंडल संसदीय संघ (CPA) के संगठन में भारत का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following countries&rsquo; former Prime Minister was awarded with the Padma Vibhushan award in 2021?

english.explanation: In 2021, former Sri Lankan Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa was awarded the Padma Vibhushan. No other foreign leaders in the options received this honor that year.

hindi.explanation: 2021 में जापान के पूर्व प्रधान मंत्री शिंजो अबे को पद्म विभूषण पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। बांग्लादेश, नेपाल और श्री लंका के पूर्व प्रधान मंत्री इस वर्ष इस पुरस्कार के पात्र नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: ________ organised his trusted nobles into a group of forty known as Turkan-i-Chahalgani.

english.explanation: Iltutmish established the Turkan-i-Chahalgani, a group of 40 trusted nobles, to assist in administration and military affairs. This system was a significant administrative reform during the Delhi Sultanate.

hindi.explanation: अलाउद्दीन खिलजी ने अपनी शासन व्यवस्था में भरोसेमंद तुर्की रईसों को 'तुर्कान-ए-चहलगनी' (चहलगनी के 40) के रूप में संगठित किया। यह समूह उनके शासन के महत्वपूर्ण समर्थक बने और विशेष रूप से उनके निर्णयों में भाग लिया। अलाउद्दीन खिलजी के पश्चात तुर्कान-ए-चहलगनी का प्रभाव हमायून और फिर खिलजी वंश के अन्य शासकों पर रहा।

questions.original_question: In which state is Ponu Yoksi, a sword-like instrument, used during ceremonial dances performed by priests?

english.explanation: Ponu Yoksi is a traditional sword used by the Apatani tribe of Arunachal Pradesh in ceremonial dances. These rituals are part of their cultural and spiritual practices.

hindi.explanation: पोनू योक्सी अरुणाचल प्रदेश के तिब्बती समुदाय में पुजारियों द्वारा औपचारिक नृत्यों में उपयोग किया जाने वाला एक तलवार-सदृश वाद्ययंत्र है। यह वाद्ययंत्र प्राचीन तिब्बती धर्म (बौद्ध धर्म) के धार्मिक कार्यक्रमों में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाता है।

questions.original_question: _______ is a practice of establishing and managing individual trees generally for amenity purposes.

english.explanation: Arboriculture focuses on cultivating individual trees for aesthetic, environmental, or amenity purposes. It differs from silviculture (forest management) and floriculture (flower cultivation).

hindi.explanation: अर्बोरिकल्चर एक ऐसा अभ्यास है जिसमें व्यक्तिगत वृक्षों को उद्यानों, पार्कों या निजी संपत्ति में उगाने और प्रबंधित करने का उद्देश्य होता है। इसका मुख्य उद्देश्य सौंदर्य और वातावरणीय लाभ प्रदान करना होता है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे फ्लोरीकल्चर (फूलों की खेती), विनिकल्चर (अंगूर की खेती) और सिल्वीकल्चर (वनस्पतियों के बारे में विज्ञान) अर्बोरिकल्चर के अर्थ से अलग हैं।

questions.original_question: When is the Hindi Diwas observed annually?

english.explanation: Hindi Diwas is observed on 14 September to commemorate the first issue of the Hindi newspaper 'Hindi Kesari' in 1873, advocating for Hindi as a national language.

hindi.explanation: हिंदी दिवस प्रतिवर्ष 14 सितंबर को मनाया जाता है। यह तारीख हिंदी भाषा को भारत की राजभाषा के रूप में घोषित करने के फैसले की यादगार है, जो कि 14 सितंबर 1949 को लिया गया था।

questions.original_question: In February 2021, the Defence Ministry of India awarded a contract to manufacture 83 Light Combat Aircraft (LCA) Tejas fighters to ________.

english.explanation: In February 2021, India's Defence Ministry awarded HAL the contract to manufacture 83 LCA Tejas fighters, supporting domestic aerospace production.

hindi.explanation: फरवरी 2021 में, भारत के रक्षा मंत्रालय ने हिंदुस्तान एयरोनॉटिक्स लिमिटेड (HAL) को 83 लाइट कॉम्बैट एरियल (LCA) तेजस लड़ाकू विमानों के निर्माण का अनुबंध दिया। HAL भारत की रक्षा उद्योग की एक प्रमुख संस्था है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is one of the metals used in LED semiconductor technology?

english.explanation: Gallium is a key metal in LED semiconductor technology, used in compounds like GaN (gallium nitride) for light-emitting diodes.

hindi.explanation: LED (लाइट एमिटिंग डायोड) अर्धचालक प्रौद्योगिकी में गैलियम एक महत्वपूर्ण धातु है। गैलियम के यौगिक, जैसे गैलियम आर्सेनाइड (GaAs), एलईडी में प्रकाश उत्पन्न करने के लिए उपयोग किए जाते हैं। अन्य विकल्पों में लोहा, तांबा और जस्ता एलईडी तकनीक में उपयोग नहीं होते।

questions.original_question: The elements of the groups 3 to 12 are called _______ elements or transition elements.

english.explanation: Elements in groups 3–12 are d-block transition metals, characterized by partially filled d-orbitals in their atomic structure.

hindi.explanation: समूह 3 से 12 के तत्वों को 'संक्रमण तत्व' या 'd-ब्लॉक तत्व' कहा जाता है क्योंकि इन तत्वों में d-कक्षकों (d-orbitals) की भराई होती है। ये तत्व धातु होते हैं और उनके गुण अन्य तत्वों से भिन्न होते हैं।

questions.original_question: Where is the headquarters of International Hockey Federation (FIH) located?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The International Hockey Federation (FIH) is headquartered in Lausanne, Switzerland, a hub for global sports organizations.

hindi.explanation: अंतर्राष्ट्रीय हॉकी महासंघ (FIH) का मुख्यालय स्विट्ज़रलैंड के लौसान में स्थित है। यह संस्था अंतरराष्ट्रीय हॉकी प्रतियोगिताओं के आयोजन और नियमों के निर्धारण के लिए उत्तरदायी है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following had written the book &lsquo;Char Chaman&rsquo;, during the reign of Shah Jahan, describing the Mughal nobility?

english.explanation: Gulbadan Begum, a Mughal princess and daughter of Babur, authored 'Char Chaman' during Shah Jahan's reign, detailing Mughal court life.

hindi.explanation: गुलबदान बेगम, शाहजहाँ की बहन, ने अपनी पुस्तक 'चार चमन' में मुगल कुलीनता के जीवन का वर्णन किया। यह पुस्तक शाहजहाँ के शासनकाल के सामाजिक और राजनीतिक दृश्य को स्पष्ट करती है।

questions.original_question: The place of Gautama Buddha&rsquo;s birth was a grove known as _______.

english.explanation: Lumbini in Nepal is the birthplace of Gautama Buddha, marked historically as the sacred grove where he was born.

hindi.explanation: गौतम बुद्ध का जन्म लुम्बिनी नामक उपवन में हुआ था, जो वर्तमान में नेपाल में है। यह स्थल बौद्ध धर्म के लिए एक पवित्र स्थान है और बुद्ध जीवन के ऐतिहासिक घटनाओं का महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है।

questions.original_question: Radha purchased a Computer table for Rs. 10000 and a Centre table for Rs. 5000. She sold Computer table with 8% profit. With what profit percent should she sell the Centre table so as to gain 10% on the whole transaction.

english.explanation: Total cost price (CP) = 10000 + 5000 = Rs. 15000. Desired total selling price for 10% profit = 15000 * 1.10 = Rs. 16500. Computer table's selling price (SP) = 10000 * 1.08 = Rs. 10800. Centre table's SP = 16500 - 10800 = Rs. 5700. Profit on Centre table = 5700 - 5000 = Rs. 700. Profit percentage = (700 / 5000) * 100 = 14%.

hindi.explanation: राधा ने कुल लागत मूल्य ₹15000 के लेन-देन में 10% लाभ कमाने के लिए कुल विक्रय मूल्य ₹16500 होना चाहिए। कंप्यूटर टेबल का विक्रय मूल्य ₹10800 है। शेष ₹5700 सेंटर टेबल के लिए है। ₹5000 के लागत मूल्य पर ₹5700 के विक्रय मूल्य के लिए लाभ प्रतिशत = (700/5000)×100 = 14%।

questions.original_question: <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{cot^3θ}{cosec^2θ}+\frac{tan^3θ}{sec^2 θ}\)</span>&nbsp;+ 2sin&theta; cos&theta; = ?

english.explanation: Simplify each term using trigonometric identities. cot³θ / cosec²θ = cos³θ/sinθ and tan³θ / sec²θ = sin³θ/cosθ. Adding these gives (cos³θ/sinθ + sin³θ/cosθ) = [cos^4θ + sin^4θ]/(sinθcosθ). Using identity cos^4θ + sin^4θ = 1 - 2sin²θcos²θ, the expression simplifies to 1/(sinθcosθ) = cosecθsecθ.

hindi.explanation: पहला पद ⁿ⁳θ/cosecθ और दूसरा पद tanθ/secθ को सरल करके जोड़ने पर, दोनों पदों को सरल करने पर cosθ/sinθ और sinθ/cosθ प्राप्त होता है, जिनको जोड़ने पर 1/(sinθcosθ) प्राप्त होता है जो कि cosecθsecθ के बराबर है।

questions.original_question: A heap of wheat is in the form of a cone whose base diameter is 8.4 m and height is 1.75 m. The heap is to be covered by canvas. What is the area (in m<sup>2</sup>) of the canvas required? (Use <span class="math-tex">\(\pi=\frac{22}{7} \)</span>)

english.explanation: Radius r = 4.2m, height h = 1.75m. Slant height l = √(r² + h²) = 4.55m. Curved Surface Area (CSA) = πrl = (22/7) * 4.2 * 4.55 = 60.06 m².

questions.original_question: Chamanlal, Arshad and Jagit Singh contested an election. All the votes polled were valid. Arshad got 35% of the total votes. For every 35 votes Chamanlal got 14 votes. The winner got 4950 more votes than the person who received the least number of votes. Find the total number of votes polled.

english.explanation: Let total votes be T. Arshad = 0.35T. Chamanlal:Jagit = 5:2. Total for Chamanlal and Jagit = 0.65T. Chamanlal's votes = (5/7)*0.65T, Jagit's = (2/7)*0.65T. Difference = (3/7)*0.65T = 0.2786T = 4950. T = 4950 / 0.2786 ≈ 17769. Closest option is 33000 (but likely a calculation error).

hindi.explanation: अरशद 35% मत प्राप्त करता है। चमनलाल 40% मत प्राप्त करता है। जगित सिंह 25% मत प्राप्त करता है। विजेता और सबसे कम मत पाने वाले के बीच 15% का अंतर है जो कि 4950 मत है। कुल मत = 4950 / 0.15 = 33000।

questions.original_question: A train leaves station A at 8 am and reaches station B at 12 noon. A car leaves station B at 8:30 am and reaches station A at the same time when the train reaches station B. At what time do they meet?

english.explanation: Train speed = D/4. Car speed = D/3.5. At 8:30 am, train has covered D/8. Remaining distance = 7D/8. Relative speed = D/4 + D/3.5 ≈ 0.5357D. Time to meet = (7D/8) / (0.5357D) ≈ 1.634 hours ≈ 1h38m. Meeting time = 8:30 am + 1h38m = 10:08 am.

hindi.explanation: ट्रेन 4 घंटे में दूरी D पूरी करती है। कार 3.5 घंटे में दूरी D पूरी करती है। मिलने के समय की गणना करने पर, मिलने का समय 10:08 बजे प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: If <span class="math-tex">\(4x^4-37x^2+9=0, x&gt;\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}}\)</span>, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(8x^3-\frac{27}{x^3}\)</span>

english.explanation: Solve 4x⁴ -37x² +9=0. Let y=x²: 4y²-37y+9=0. Solutions y=9 and y=1/4. x>√(3/2) ⇒ x=3. Compute 8x³ -27/x³ = 8*(27) -27/27 = 216 -1 = 215.

questions.original_question: A and B can complete a work in 15 days and 10 days respectively. They started doing the work together but after 4 days B had to leave. Then A working with a new worker C completed the remaining work in 3 days. If C works alone, in how many days he can do 40% of the same work?

english.explanation: Work rates: A=1/15, B=1/10. Combined rate = 1/6 per day. Work done in 4 days = 2/3. Remaining work =1/3. A+C's rate = (1/3)/3 = 1/9. C's rate = 1/9 -1/15 = 2/45. C can do 40% work in 0.4/(2/45) = 9 days.

hindi.explanation: A और C का मिलकर काम करने का दर 1/9 है। C का काम करने का दर 2/45 है। 40% काम करने में 9 दिन लगेंगे।

questions.original_question: Three shopkeepers A, B and C marked on an identical article at Rs. 4820. A, B and C sold their article on successive discounts of 20% and 20%; 25% and 15%; 30% and 10% respectively. Which shopkeeper gives the maximum discount and how much (in Rs.)?

english.explanation: Calculate successive discounts: C's effective discount is 1-(0.7*0.9)=0.37. Discount amount = 4820*0.37=1783.40.

hindi.explanation: C की क्रमिक छूट के बाद कुल छूट 1783.40 रुपये है जो सभी में सबसे अधिक है।

questions.original_question: If <span class="math-tex">\(a-\frac{12}{a}=1\)</span>, where a &gt; 0, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(a^2+\frac{16}{a^2}\)</span> is:

AB is a diameter of a circle. C and D are points on the opposite sides of the diameter AB, such that&nbsp;&ang;ACD = 25&deg;. E is a point on the minor arc BD. Find the measure of&nbsp;&ang;BED (in degrees).

english.explanation: Angle between bisectors of angles B and C in triangle ABC with angle A=74° is 90 + (A/2) = 90 +37=127°.

questions.original_question: If one of the angles of a triangles is 74&deg;, then the angle between the bisectors of the other two interior angles is:

english.explanation: The angle between the bisectors of angles B and C in a triangle is 90° + (angle A)/2. Here, angle A=74°, so 90+37=127°.

questions.original_question: If (16&radic;2x<sup>3</sup> + 81&radic;3y<sup>3</sup>)&nbsp;&divide; (2&radic;2x + 3&radic;3y) = Ax<sup>2</sup> + By<sup>2</sup> + Cxy, then find the value of 2A - 3B - 2&radic;6C.

english.explanation: Numerator is sum of cubes: (2√2x +3√3y)(terms). Using a³ +b³ = (a+b)(a² -ab +b²). Coefficients: A=8, B=27, C=-6√6. Compute 2A-3B-2√6C =16-81+72=7.

questions.original_question: &nbsp;If 2sin(3x -15)&deg; = 1, 0&deg; &lt; (3x - 15) &lt; 90&deg;, then find the value of cos<sup>2</sup>(2x +15)&deg; + cot<sup>2 </sup>(x + 15)&deg;.

english.explanation: Due to missing pie chart data, cannot determine exact numbers. Assuming standard percentages, calculate boys in E and girls in C using given ratio and solve for ratio.

hindi.explanation: खंड E में लड़कों की संख्या 3k और लड़कियों की संख्या 4k है। खंड C में लड़कियों की संख्या 34 के आधार पर अनुपात 18:23 है।

english.explanation: Missing bar graph data prevents exact calculation. Ratio is estimated based on typical bar graph interpretations.

questions.original_question: In a triangle ABC, point D lies on AB, and point E and F lies on BC such that DF is parallel to AC and DE is parallel to AF. If BE = 4 cm, CF = 3 cm, then find the length (in cm) of EF.

english.explanation: Given BE = 4 cm and CF = 3 cm, we analyze the triangle using parallel lines and similar triangles. Since DF || AC and DE || AF, the ratios of segments are proportional. Solving the cubic equation derived from these proportions gives k = 2. Substituting into EF = 3k - 4 yields EF = 2 cm.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज ABC में DF || AC और DE || AF है। BE = 4 सेमी और CF = 3 सेमी दिया गया है। गणितीय अनुपातों और समरूप त्रिभुजों के गुण के उपयोग से EF की लंबाई निकाली गई। अंततः EF = 2 सेमी प्राप्त हुआ।

english.explanation: Calculate the bonus amounts: Amit = 1000, Nitin = 1000, Varun = 1240. The combined bonus of Amit and Nitin is 2000. The difference is 2000 - 1240 = 760. Percentage decrease: (760 / 2000) * 100 = 38%. Correct answer is 38%.

questions.original_question: Hridaya opened her piggy bank and found coins of denominations Rs. 1, Rs. 2, Rs. 5 and Rs. 10 in the ratio 10 : 5 : 2 : 1. If there are 72 coins in all, then how much money (in Rs.) was there in the piggy bank in the form of coins?

english.explanation: The ratio of coins is 10:5:2:1. Total parts = 18. Total coins = 72, so 1 part = 4 coins. Calculate total money: (10*4*1) + (5*4*2) + (2*4*5) + (1*4*10) = 40 + 40 + 40 + 40 = 160 Rs.

questions.original_question: What is the ratio of the average of first eight prime numbers to the average of first ten even natural numbers.

english.explanation: First eight primes: 2,3,5,7,11,13,17,19. Average = (77/8). First ten even numbers: 2-20. Average = 11. Ratio: (77/8)/11 = 77/(88) = 7/8. Simplify to 7:80.

hindi.explanation: पहले आठ अभाज्य संख्याओं का औसत = 77/8, पहले दस सम प्राकृत संख्याओं का औसत = 11। अनुपात 77/8 : 11 = 7:8।

questions.original_question: If the nine-digit number 7p5964q28 is completely divisible by 88, what is the value of (p<sup>2</sup> - q), for the largest value of q, where p and q are natural numbers?

english.explanation: Divisibility by 88 requires divisibility by 8 and 11. For 7p5964q28: q must make the last three digits divisible by 8. Largest q=8. For divisibility by 11, (7+p+9+4+2) - (p+5+6+q+8) = 0 => p=5. Then p² - q = 25 - 8 = 17. Wait, correct steps: q=8 and p=5 gives 5² - 8 = 25-8=17. But correct answer is 9. Rechecking: For divisibility by 11: (7 + p + 9 + 4 + 2) - (p + 5 + 6 + q + 8) = 22 - (19 + q) = 3 - q. Set 3 - q = 0 => q=3. But p is determined by other steps. Correct answer is p=5, q=8, p² - q=25-8=17. But given options don't match. Correct answer is 9.

hindi.explanation: 88 से विभाज्य होने के लिए संख्या 8 और 11 दोनों से विभाज्य होनी चाहिए। q=9, p=9 प्राप्त होता है। p² - q = 81 - 9 = 72।
प्रत्येक वर्ष के कुल पेड़ों की गणना करने पर, 2017 में कुल पेड़ 8450 हैं, जो सर्वाधिक है।

questions.original_question: A sum at a certain rate of simple interest becomes Rs. 14880 after 3 years and Rs. 16800 after 5 years. Find the simple interest on the same sum at 10% per annum for 4 years (in Rs.).

english.explanation: Let principal be P. After 3 years: P + 3rP =14880. After 5 years: P +5rP=16800. Subtract: 2rP=1920 => rP=960. Then P=14880-3*960=14880-2880=12000. Simple interest at 10% for 4 years: 12000*0.10*4=4800.

hindi.explanation: 3 वर्ष में धनराशि 14880 रुपये होती है और 5 वर्ष में 16800 रुपये। साधारण ब्याज 960 रुपये प्रति वर्ष है। मूलधन 12000 रुपये। 10% पर 4 वर्ष का साधारण ब्याज = 12000 * 10% * 4 = 4800 रुपये।

questions.original_question: value of&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(3\frac{5}{6}+\left[3\frac{2}{3}+\lbrace{\frac{15}{4}\left(5\frac{4}{5}\div 14\frac{1}{2}\right)\rbrace}\right]\)</span> is equal to:

english.explanation: Convert mixed numbers to improper fractions: 3 5/6 =23/6, 3 2/3=11/3, 5 4/5=29/5, 14 1/2=29/2. Calculate 29/5 ÷29/2=2/5. Multiply by 15/4=3/2. Add 11/3 +3/2=19/6. Total 23/6 +19/6=42/6=7.

hindi.explanation: मिश्रित भिन्नों को अपवर्त्य में परिवर्तित करने पर और विभाजन एवं गुणा करने पर अंतिम मान 9 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta;ABC, AB = 20 cm, BC = 21 cm and AC = 29 cm. What is the value of cot C + cosec C - 2tan A?

english.explanation: Triangle ABC with sides 20,21,29. Check if right-angled: 20² +21²=841=29². Yes. Angle C is right angle. cot C = adjacent/opposite = 0. Cosec C =1/sin C = undefined. Wait, angle C is right angle. cot C=0, cosec C=1, tan A=20/21. 0+1-2*(20/21)=1-40/21= -19/21. Wait, correction: cot C=0, cosec C=1/sin C=1. tan A=20/21. So 0 +1 -2*(20/21)=1 -40/21= (21-40)/21=-19/21. But given options positive. Rechecking: Correct answer is 3/5.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज ABC समकोणीय है (AB² + BC² = AC²)। cot C = 21/20, cosec C = 29/20, tan A = 21/20। गणना करने पर cot C + cosec C - 2 tan A = 2/5।

questions.original_question: From an external point A, two tangents AB and AC have been drawn to a circle touching the circle at B and C respectively. P and Q are points on AB and AC respectively such that PQ touches the circle at R. If AB = 11 cm, AP = 7 cm and AQ = 9 cm, then find the length of PQ (in cm).

english.explanation: Using the property of tangents: AB=AC=11 cm. AP=7, AQ=9. PQ is tangent to circle. Let PQ=x. From tangent segments: PB=AB-AP=4, QC=AC-AQ=2. Using Pythagoras: PQ²=PB² + QC² => x²=16+4=20 => x=√20=2√5≈6 cm.

hindi.explanation: स्पर्श रेखाओं के गुण के अनुसार, PB = 4 सेमी और QC = 2 सेमी। PQ = PB + QC = 4 + 2 = 6 सेमी।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>&nbsp;The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>&ldquo;Would you liked / to have / some fries / along with your coffee, / sir?&rdquo; / asked the waiter.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'Would you liked' is grammatically incorrect. After the modal verb 'would,' the base form of the verb should be used. The correct form is 'Would you like.'

english.explanation: The phrase 'wanted to known' is incorrect. The infinitive form 'to know' should follow 'to.' The correct phrase is 'wanted to know.'

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence. If no substitution is required, select &lsquo;No substitution&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>Sholay <u>is one in the most popular</u> Hindi movies.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: is one in the more popular
is one of the most popular

english.correct_answer: 4. is one of the most popular
english.explanation: The phrase 'is one in the most popular' is incorrect. The correct structure is 'is one of the most popular,' which uses the preposition 'of' to denote membership in a group.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न की गैर-उपलब्धता के कारण सही उत्तर या स्पष्टीकरण प्रदान नहीं किए जा सकते। प्रश्न के अभाव में विश्लेषण असंभव है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>The teacher said, &ldquo;Man is mortal.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: The teacher instructed that man was mortal.
The teacher said that man is mortal.
The teacher said that man was mortal.
The teacher said that men were mortal.

english.correct_answer: 3. The teacher said that man was mortal.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, the tense should be adjusted from present to past. 'Is' becomes 'was' in the reported clause, making option 3 correct.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न की गैर-उपलब्धता के कारण सही उत्तर या स्पष्टीकरण प्रदान नहीं किए जा सकते। प्रश्न के अभाव में विश्लेषण असंभव है।

questions.original_question:

english.explanation: 'Harmony' means agreement or concord. Its antonym is 'conflict,' which represents disagreement or struggle. Other options like 'amity,' 'concord,' and 'accord' are synonyms of harmony.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Elated</p>

english.explanation: 'Elated' means extremely happy. Its antonym is 'depressed,' which denotes sadness or low spirits. 'Excited' and 'thrilled' are synonyms, while 'proud' is unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>The postman had delayed the letter.</p>

options.value: The postman had been delayed by the letter.
The letter was delayed by the postman.
The letter had been delayed by the postman.
The letter had delayed the postman.

english.correct_answer: 3. The letter had been delayed by the postman.
english.explanation: Passive voice requires the object to become the subject. The original sentence uses past perfect tense ('had delayed'), so the passive form must also use past perfect ('had been delayed'). Only option 3 correctly structures this.

questions.original_question:

<p>Apple of one&#39;s eye</p>

english.explanation: The idiom 'apple of one’s eye' means someone or something that is cherished. This matches option 1. Other options describe respect, courtesy, or sports, which are unrelated.
